name: USoundSourceBus
doc: A source bus is a type of USoundBase and can be "played" like any sound.

SourceBusChannels: How many channels to use for the source bus if the audio bus is not specified, otherwise it will use the audio bus object's channel count.
SourceBusDuration: The duration (in seconds) to use for the source bus. A duration of 0.0 indicates to play the source bus indefinitely.
AudioBus: Audio bus to use as audio for this source bus. This source bus will sonify the audio from the audio bus.
